Name: NinjaThea
About the game: Mischievous critters have stolen all the fruit from the local grocery store. It's up to you, brave little NinjaThea, to punish the critters and gather all the fruit as fast as you can. As short and simple 2D platformer, inspired by the creativity and imagination of a 4-year old little girl. Run, jump and slash your way across 7 different stages, collecting a variety of fruit while avoiding traps and evil critters. Your every run is timed, so you ca go back and try to best yourself. Good luck!
